name: Scope of chapter
text:
[§507D-3]  Scope of chapter.  Nothing in this chapter is intended to affect:
     (1)  Any lien provided for by statute;
     (2)  Any consensual liens now or hereafter recognized under the common law of this State; or
     (3)  The ability of courts to impose equitable or constructive liens. [L 1996, c 24, pt of §1]
